Articles.Content:
Hello,

I built station, docket craft to it and closed game. Now I want to continue playing, however when I load station or approach it with other craft it shakes engines off. Each time exactly same part falls off. I have view utility mods like Mechjeb and Kerbal Engineer, only part mod is USI life support. I have 1.4 and dlc.

For a short term fix, try Kerbal Joint reinforcement.  Might help keep the station together on loading.

Screenshots would help, perhaps there is some parts clipped that is causing this?
